definition: to print/to publish/publication/periodical/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend

sentences.english: The "Oriental Culture" is issued twice a month as the official publication of GDCCP.
sentences.chinese: 創辦會刊《東方文化》雙月刊雜誌。

sentences.english: Me suscribí a una revista mensual.
The fifth part, "The Analects" fortnightly in history.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分，《論語》半月刊的歷史地位。

sentences.english: The fourth part, "The Analects" fortnightly personality characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，《論語》半月刊的個性特色。

sentences.english: In the publishing of semimonthly sci-tech periodicals, there exists a speed problem of manuscript review.
sentences.chinese: 科技期刊半月刊存在審稿速度問題。

sentences.english: He writes short reviews for the monthly magazines.
The famous bimonthly journal International Affairs is one of them.
sentences.chinese: 其中《國際事務》雙月刊在國際上影響較大。

sentences.english: The study appears in the journal Personality and Individual Differences.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究公佈在月刊《個性與個體差異》上。

sentences.english: The monthly magazine will be changed to a daily publication next year.
sentences.chinese: 這份月刊從明年開始就要改成日刊了。

sentences.english: It is a serial comic in a monthly comic magazine.
sentences.chinese: 這個漫畫版是以月刊的方式連載中。

sentences.english: The third part, "The Analects" fortnightly production and dissemination mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，《論語》半月刊生產與傳播機制。

sentences.english: We perused the June edition, but didn't see a lot of interactivity.
sentences.chinese: 我們精讀了6月刊，但沒有發現多少互動性。

sentences.english: The newsagent sells all the computer monthlies.
sentences.chinese: 那家報刊經銷商銷售所有電腦月刊。

sentences.english: The bookstore sells all the computer monthlies.
sentences.chinese: 這家書店出售所有的計算機月刊。

sentences.english: We also have a bilingual, bimonthly booklet we would like to give you.
sentences.chinese: 我們同時也有中英對照雙月刊的小冊子要送給你。

sentences.english: It appears in the January/February issue of the journal, Child Development.
sentences.chinese: 它出現在《兒童發展》這本雜誌的一二月刊上。

definition: to start publishing/to found a journal
old variant of 刊[kan1]/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend
